item.title: Generating 2D Images of Molecules from MOL Files using Open Babel
item.description: Open Babel is a tool to work with molecular data in any way from converting one type to another, analyzing, molecular modeling, etc. It also has a method to convert MOL files into SVG or PNG images to represent them as 2D images. Install Open Babel in Linux as following or go to their page for different operating systems sudo apt-get install openbabel Open Babel uses the same command to generate SVG or PNG and recognizes the file format using the given filename to as the output option -O.
